entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pikangikum
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 5:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -18.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -23.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
